VersionInfo.Title: West Wind Markdown Monster 1.0 now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
Markdown Monster 1.0 RTM has arrived!
If you're upgrading from a version prior to 0.57, we recommend that you completely uninstall Markdown Monster and reinstall the new version to clear out files that are no longer used. Your existing configuration files will be updated. Registered users will have to re-apply their registration key in this version due to a change in the key format for the release version.
For more detailed release info please see: https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/master/Changelog.md
